articles.title: 📚 Projects
articles.contents:
🧏‍♂️ Language Teaching and Learning Methods among Hearing-Impaired Students in Kerala


MPhil Thesis, 2022


Exploratory research using methodological pluralism: ethnographic and case study methods.


Designed and administered a comprehensive questionnaire in three schools across Kerala.


Collected insights from hearing-impaired students and their teachers.


Transcribed recorded interviews for interpretative and descriptive analysis.


Uncovered patterns in teaching and learning strategies in inclusive education contexts.




🦠 Coronavirus Infectious Disease Ontology from Malayalam Data Set


Aspire Scholarship Project, 2021


Compiled a comprehensive Malayalam COVID-19 text corpus focused on linguistic and thematic relevance.


Conducted text preprocessing: tokenization, stemming, lemmatization, and n-gram modeling.


Prepared the dataset for computational linguistic analysis and ontology development.




📰 Lexemes of COVID-19: A Linguistics Study Based on Newspapers in Kerala


MA Dissertation, 2020


Qualitative research using descriptive analysis to examine COVID-19-related linguistic patterns.


Systematically sampled data from a time series of Malayalam newspapers.


Executed classification and analysis of pandemic-related lexemes.


Yielded insights into how media language evolved during the crisis.
